attributes.action: Allowing a child to take a mobile phone into school as safety precortion
attributes.background: My daughter takes her mobile phone to school for safety purposes, travelling to and from school, to inform me if she has to stay late for a detention. In this day and age it is a must with many attempted abductions from her school. The school are refusing to return the phone.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Mobile phone policy in schools is the responsibility of individual schools. You could raise this with the school's governing body.
